data.title: TAGATA PASIFIKA - LAND HAS EYES - ROTUMAN FILM PREMIERE
data.meta_description: A look at one of the first feature films written and directed by a Pacific Islander. First time film-maker Vilsoni Hereniko, a Fijian citizen from the island of Rotuman, talks about his film "The Land Has Eyes".

DIRECTOR: Osone Okesene

PRODUCER: Stephen Stehlin

TPA: Ngaire Coley

A look at one of the first feature films written and directed by a Pacific Islander. First time film-maker Vilsoni Hereniko, a Fijian citizen from the island of Rotuman, talks about his film "The Land Has Eyes".
